SA10n1065:3: yadi iha saṃtānāvicchedakrameṇa janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā hetuphalabhāvapravṛttyā saṃskārāṇāmātmano vā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt,
SA10n1065:5: yathāvarṇite saṃsārābhāve tu utpattyanantaravināśitvāccittasya karmākṣepakāle ca vipākasyāsadbhāvāt karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāva eva syāt |
SA10n1065:6: saṃsārasadbhāve tu sati iha kṛtasya karmaṇe janmāntare'pi vipākaphalasaṃbandhāt karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃbandho na virodhito bhavati |
SA10n1065:8: kāni punastāni karmāṇi kiṃ vā tatphalamiti tatprabheda vivakṣayedamucyate -
SA10n1065:10: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca ||1 ||
SA10n1065:13: cinoti upacinoti śubhamaśubhaṃ karma vipākadānasāmarthye niyamayatīti cetaḥ |
SA10n1065:15: ātmānaṃ saṃyamayati viṣayeṣvasvatantrayati rāgādikleśavaśena pravṛttiṃ nivārayatītyātmasaṃyamakam |
SA10n1065:16: tadetadātmasaṃyamakaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaḥ prāṇātipātādiṣu pravṛtti vidhārakaṃ durgatigamanāddhārayatīti dharma ityucyate ||
SA10n1065:19: tatra svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena sarve sāsravā anāsravāśca dharmā ityucyante |
SA10n1065:21: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃlloke paratra ca ||
SA10n1065:25: kiṃ punarātmasaṃyamakamevaikaṃ cetaḥ dharma iti ? netyāha |
SA10n1065:26: kiṃ tarhi parānugrāhakaṃ ca maitraṃ ca yaccetaḥ,
SA10n1065:45: yattu sādhāraṇaṃ kṣityādi na tadbījaṃ kāraṇametat |
SA10n1065:47: ihāpi iṣṭasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttau trividhaṃ ceto bhavati bījam |
SA10n1065:49: kasmin punaḥ kāle bījasya phalaniṣpattirityāha - pretya ceha ca |
SA10n1065:53: evaṃ tāvat cittātmakamevaikaṃ dharmaṃ vyavasthāpya punarapi dvividhaṃ bhagavatā -
SA10n1065:56: paramaścāsau ṛṣiśceti paramarṣiḥ sarvākāratayā paramārthagamanāt śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhyo'pi utkṛṣṭatvāt paramarṣiḥ saṃbuddho bhagavān |
SA10n1065:65: manodvāreṇaiva niṣṭhāgamanāt kāyavākpravṛttinirapekṣatvācca manovijñāna saṃprayuktaiva cetanā mānasaṃ karmetyucyate |
SA10n1065:69: evaṃ ca evaṃ ca kāyavāgbhyāṃ pravartiṣye ityevaṃ cetasā saṃcintya yat kriyate,
SA10n1065:74: evaṃ ca trividham - kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca ||3 ||
SA10n1065:75: etadapi trividhaṃ karma punarbhidyamānaṃ saptavidhaṃ saṃjāyate,
SA10n1065:76: ityevaṃ tasya karmaṇo bhagavatā bahuprakāro bhedo'nuvarṇitaḥ |
SA10n1065:81: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ ||5 ||
SA10n1065:84: tatra kuśalākuśalā vā vāk sarvaiva viratyaviratilakṣaṇā vijñaptisamutthāpikā sāmānyena vāgiti gṛhyate |
SA10n1065:85: evaṃ kuśalo'kuśalo vā viratyaviratilakṣaṇo vijñaptisamutthāpako viṣpandaḥ sāmānyena gṛhyate ||
SA10n1065:89: tatra aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ tadyathā adyaprabhṛti mayā prāṇinaṃ hatvā cauryaṃ kṛtvā jīvikā parikalpayitavyeti pāpakarmābhyupagamātprabhṛti tadakāriṇo'pi akuśalakarmābhyupagamahetukāḥ satatasamitamavijñaptayaḥ samupajāyante |
SA10n1065:90: kaivartādīnāṃca jālādiparikarmakālātprabhṛti tadakāriṇāmapi yā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
SA10n1065:92: yathā caitāstathā anyāḥ viratilakṣaṇāḥ kuśalasvabhāvā avijñaptayaḥ |
SA10n1065:93: tadyathā - adyaprabhṛti prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativiramāmīti kāyavāgvijñaptiparisamāptikāla kṣaṇātprabhṛti taduttarakālaṃ pramattādyavasthasyāpi yāḥ kuśalopacayasvabhāvā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
SA10n1065:95: etā rūpakriyāsvabhāvā api satyo vijñaptivat parānna vijñāpayantītyavijñaptayaḥ ||
SA10n1065:106: yathā yathā hi tatkīrtau prāṇino hanyante,
SA10n1065:107: tathā tathā taddevakulādyupabhogāt tatkartṛṇāṃ saṃtāne paribhogānvayamapuṇyamapi jāyate ,
SA10n1065:110: saṃkṣepeṇa etatsaptavidhaṃ karma bhavati - kuśalākuśalā vāk,
SA10n1065:117: ete ca sapta dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ karmatvenābhivyaktāḥ karmalakṣaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ||5 ||
SA10n1065:120: atha na tiṣṭhati utpattyanantaravināśitvāt? yadi tāvat -
SA10n1065:123: yadi utpannaṃ sat karma āvipākakālaṃ svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate iti parikalpyate,
SA10n1065:124: tad iyantaṃ kālamasya nityatā āpadyate vināśarahitatvāt |
SA10n1065:127: pūrvaṃ vināśarahitasya ākāśādivat paścādapi vināśena saṃbandhābhāvāt |
SA10n1065:134: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati |
SA10n1065:135: abhāvībhūtaṃ sat karma avidyamānasvabhāvatvānnaiva phalaṃ janayiṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ ||6 ||
SA10n1065:139: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati |
SA10n1065:143: iha bījaṃ kṣaṇikamapi sat svajātīyabhāviphalaviśeṣaniṣpattisāmarthyaviśeṣayuktasyaiva saṃtānasya aṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrādyabhidhānasya hetubhāvamapyupagamya nirudhyate |
SA10n1065:145: tasmāt krameṇa sahakārikāraṇavaikalye sati svalpādapi hetorvipulaphalapracaya upajāyate |
SA10n1065:146: ṛte bījāt vinā bījāt sa ca aṅkurādisaṃtānaḥ nābhipravartate |
SA10n1065:147: tadevaṃ tadbhāve bhāvitvena tadabhāve ca abhāvitvena bījahetukatvamaṅkurādisaṃtānasya phalasyopadarśitaṃ bhavati ||7 ||
SA10n1065:158: yathā ca bīje ayaṃ kramo'nuvarṇitaḥ, evam -
SA10n1065:162: tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāparibhāvitāccittasaṃtānāt sahakārikāraṇasaṃnidhānāvaikalye sati iṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ phalamupajāyate sugatidurgatiṣu |
SA10n1065:163: ṛte tu taccitāt cittamantareṇa sa ca nābhipravartate ||9 ||
SA10n1065:167: yadi arhaccaramacittamiva taddhetuphalapāraṃparyāvicchinnakramavartino bhāvinaścittasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamanupagamya kuśalaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyeta,
SA10n1065:169: athāpi anāgata saṃtānasya hetubhāvamupagamya svarūpādapracyutaṃ syāt,
SA10n1065:173: tadatra yathoditakarmaprabhedavyākhyāne daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vyākhyātāḥ | te ca -
SA10n1065:175: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca ||11 ||
SA10n1065:176: ta ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmasya sādhanopāyā niṣpattihetubhūtā ityarthaḥ ||
SA10n1065:183: pariniṣṭhitarūpā ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmaśabdavācyā bhavanti,
SA10n1065:185: tadasya uktalakṣaṇasya ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā niṣpattau hetutvena vyavasthāpyante |
SA10n1065:186: kathaṃ punaratra prakrānte karmavibhāge daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā iti ? ucyate -
SA10n1065:189: cetanā cetyanena abhidhyāvyāpāda samyagdṛṣṭayākhyāsrayo mānasā vyākhyātāḥ |
SA10n1065:190: ityevaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathā atra vyākhyātāḥ |
SA10n1065:191: te ca yathoditasya dharmasya niṣpattihetavo bhavanti |
SA10n1065:192: asya ca dharmasya rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyalakṣaṇāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ |
SA10n1065:197: tān prati apare doṣamudbhāvya anyākṣepaparihāraṃ varṇayantaḥ āhuḥ -
SA10n1065:201: tadā bahavaśca doṣāḥ saṃkhyābahutvena mahāntaśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhena parapakṣe prāpruvanti |
SA10n1065:203: yadi hi bījasaṃtānadṛṣṭāntena śālibījāt śālyaṅkurādisaṃtāna eva pravartate,
SA10n1065:214: kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravacittebhyaḥ sadṛśānāmeva cittānāṃ kāmarūpārūpyāva carānāsravāṇāmutpādaḥ syāt,
SA10n1065:217: tataśca yo devaḥ sa deva eva syāt,
SA10n1065:218: yo manuṣyaḥ sa manuṣya eva syādityādi |
SA10n1065:219: tataśca akuśalamapi kurvatāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gatiyonivarṇabuddhīndriyabalarūpabhogādi vaicitryaṃ na syādapāyapatanaṃ ca |
SA10n1065:221: evaṃ bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā yasmādbīja saṃtānasādharmyakalpanāyāṃ prasajyante,
SA10n1065:223: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate |
SA10n1065:228: iha kuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ sat utpādānantarameva nirudhyate,
SA10n1065:231: tadā etasya karmaṇo'vipraṇāśo nāma viprayukto dharmaḥ kartuḥ saṃtāne samupajāyate ṛṇapatrasthānīyaḥ |
SA10n1065:232: tadevaṃ patraṃ yathā avipraṇāśaḥ tathā veditavyaḥ |
SA10n1065:233: yasya ca asau avipraṇāśākhyo dharma utpadyate,
SA10n1065:235: yathā ca ṛṇapatrāvasthānāt prayukte'pi dhane dhanino na dhananāśo bhavati,
SA10n1065:236: saṃbadhyata eva sa kālāntareṇa pañcamena dhanaskandhena,
SA10n1065:237: tathā vinaṣṭe'pi karmaṇi avipraṇāśākhyadharmāntarāvasthānāt tannimittakena phalena abhisaṃbadhyata eva kartā |
SA10n1065:238: yathā ca ṛṇapatraṃ dāturdhanābhyāgamaṃ kṛtvā nirmuktaṃ sat punarapi vidyamānaṃ vā avidyamānaṃ vā na dhanābhyāgame samartham,
SA10n1065:239: evamavipraṇāśo'pi dattavipākaḥ san vidyamāno vā avidyamāno vā na śaknoti nirmuktapatravat kartuḥ punarapi vipākasaṃbandhaṃ kartum ||
SA10n1065:251: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā |
SA10n1065:253: pārthagjanikāni karmāṇi darśanamārgeṇaiva prahīyante mā bhūdāryaḥ pṛthagjanakarmasamanvāgata iti |
SA10n1065:255: kiṃ tu bhāvanāmārgeṇa vā tasyā prahāṇaṃ bhavati |
SA10n1065:260: yadi punarapi asya avipraṇāśasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇena prahāṇātprahāṇataḥ prahāṇaṃ syāt karmaṇaśca saṃkrameṇa karmaṇo vināśena karmāntarasaṃmukhībhāvena vināśaḥ syāt,
SA10n1065:269: evaṃ karmavadhādayo doṣāḥ prasajyante prahāṇataḥ praheyatvābhyupagame sati avipraṇāśasya |
SA10n1065:275: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva sabhāgānāṃ ca viṣabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ kāmarūpārūpyadhātupratisaṃdhiṣu sarvakarmāpamardanaḥ eka eva avipraṇāśa utpadyate |
SA10n1065:276: sa cāpi sadhātūnāṃ samānadhātukānāmeva utpadyate na viṣabhāgadhātukānām ||17 ||
SA10n1065:277: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ |
SA10n1065:279: sa cāyamavipraṇāśākhyo dharmaḥ sarvasyaiva karmaṇaḥ cetanācetayitvāsvabhāvasya sāsravānāsravabhedena vā dviprakārabhinnasya dṛṣṭe dharme ihaiva janmani karmaṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ ekaiko'vipraṇāśa utpadyate |
SA10n1065:280: sa cāyamavipraṇāśo vipakke'pi vipāke nāvaśyaṃ nirudhyate,
SA10n1065:281: nirbhuktapatravacca vidyamāno'pi san na śaknoti punarapi vipaktum ||18 ||
SA10n1065:283: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet ||19 ||
SA10n1065:291: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam |
SA10n1065:299: avipraṇāśadharmasadbhāvāt bījasaṃtānasādharmyaparikalpanābhāvācca nānāgatijātiyonidhātubhedabhinnaśca pāñcagatikaḥ saṃsāro vicitraḥ siddho bhavati |
SA10n1065:304: evaṃ niravaśeṣāvidyānidrāpagamādvibuddhena bhagavatā yasmādayaṃ dharmo deśitaḥ,
SA10n1065:307: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati || iti,
SA10n1065:310: atrocyate- kimiha bhavanto gandharvanagaraprākārapatanātiśaṅkitayā atīvodvignāḥ tatparirakṣāpariśramāyāsamāpannāḥ,
SA10n1065:311: ye nāma yūyaṃ karmaṇyanupapadyamāne tatphalanimittaṃ vipravadadhvam?
SA10n1065:325: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām ||iti ?
SA10n1065:330: avaśyaṃ caitadevaṃ vijñeyam- niḥsvabhāvaṃ karmeti | anyathā hi -
SA10n1065:332: akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam ||22 ||
SA10n1065:342: yacca vidyamānaṃ tasya karaṇānupapatteḥ tannaiva kāraṇamapekṣata iti ||22 ||
SA10n1065:343: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi akṛta eva sakalasya lokasya vipāko yasmāt, tataśca -
SA10n1065:350: tasyāpi akṛtamapi sat tat karma astyeveti tenāpyasya saṃbandhādakṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syāt |
SA10n1065:355: vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ |
SA10n1065:357: ye hi ete kṛṣivāṇijyagorakṣādayaḥ kriyārambhāḥ phalārthamārabhyante,
SA10n1065:366: ubhayorapi puṇyapāpakṛtoḥ akṛtayorapi puṇyapāpayoḥ pratyekaṃ vidyamānatvāt || 24 ||
SA10n1065:373: yasmāt tatkarma vyavasthitamasti tasmānniḥsaṃśayaṃ yathopavarṇitā doṣāḥ prāpnuvanti sasvabhāvatve |
SA10n1065:389: karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ |
SA10n1065:390: na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham ||26 ||
SA10n1065:395: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmātkleśā na tattvataḥ ||iti |
SA10n1065:399: atrāha - vidyanta eva kleśā karmāṇi ca,
SA10n1065:409: karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā ||27 ||
SA10n1065:412: tataśca karma kleśā yadā na santi,
SA10n1065:413: tadā tatkāryāṇāṃ dehānāmasattve kā kathā bhaviṣyati?
SA10n1065:422: sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ ||28 ||
SA10n1065:423: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamaḥ saṃmoha iti paryāyāḥ |
SA10n1065:425: pāñcagatika saṃsāre punaḥ punarjāyata iti jantuḥ |
SA10n1065:431: atha ca punaridaṃ pāpaṃ karma svayameva kṛtam,
SA10n1065:432: asya svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti vacanāt |
SA10n1065:438: atrocyate - syātkarmaṇaḥ kartā karmaphalasya copabhoktā yadi karmaiva syāt |
SA10n1065:443: karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam |
SA10n1065:444: asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati ||30 ||
SA10n1065:452: tadapi - hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca ityādinā karmakārakaparīkṣāyāṃ vistareṇa pratipāditam |
SA10n1065:453: yataścaivaṃ pratyayasamutpannaṃ vā apratyayasamutpannaṃ vā karmedaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1065:455: yadā caivaṃ karma ca kartā ca nāsti,
SA10n1065:456: tadā nirhetukaṃ karmajaṃ phalaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti,
SA10n1065:457: asati ca phale kuta eva phalabhoktā bhaviṣyatīti,
SA10n1065:459: atrāha - yadi evaṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati,
SA10n1065:460: yattarhi etaduktaṃ bhagavatā -svayaṃ kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti,
SA10n1065:468: atha manyase - niḥsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vyāpārakaraṇānupapatteḥ tadavastha eva doṣa iti,
SA10n1065:472: tathāhi niḥsvabhāvā eva santo ghaṭādayaḥ loke svakāryakṛt upalabhyante ||30 ||
SA10n1065:475: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ ||31 ||
SA10n1065:476: tadyathā - ekaṃ nirmitakaṃ śāstā buddho bhagavān ṛddhisaṃpadā ṛddhiprabhāveṇa nirmimīta,
SA10n1065:477: sa cāpi nirmitakaḥ punaḥ yo'yaṃ buddhena bhagavatā nirmitaḥ,
SA10n1065:479: tatra ya eṣa nirmitakaḥ aparasya nirmitakasya nirmātā,
SA10n1065:487: tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam |
SA10n1065:489: yo hyatra karmaṇaḥ kartā sa nirmitakākāraḥ svabhāvaśūnyaḥ |
SA10n1065:490: tena ca svabhāvaśūnyena svatantrakartrā yat kiṃcit karma kriyate,
SA10n1065:492: tadyathā nirmitakena anyo nirmitako nirmitaḥ tathā veditavyam |
SA10n1065:519: tannirmitabodhisattvena gandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau samantabhadratathāgatopabhuktaśeṣaṃ bhojanamānītaṃ nānāvyañjanakhādyādisaṃprayuktaṃ pṛthakpṛthagvividharasamekabhojanena sarvaṃ tacchrāvakabodhisattvasaṃgharājarājāmātyapurohitāntaḥ puradauvārikasārthavāhādijanapadaṃ saṃtarpya prītyākāraṃ nāma mahāsamādhiṃ lambhayāmāsa | iti ||
SA10n1065:524: api ca amībhyo dṛṣṭāntebhyaḥ sphuṭaṃ naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratīyatāmiti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1065:525: kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca |
SA10n1065:537: pañca ca bhikṣuśatāni dhyānalābhīni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanā manavabudhyamānāni anavataranti anavagāhamānāni anadhimucyamānāni |
SA10n1065:538: bhagavānāha - tathā hyete kāśyapa bhikṣavaḥ ābhimānikāḥ imāmanāsravāṃ śīlaviśuddhiṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante |
SA10n1065:539: gambhīraḥ kāśyapa gāthābhinirhāro gambhīrā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ |
SA10n1065:542: etāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni kāśyapasya tathāgatasya pravacane'nyatīrthikaśrāvakā abhūvan |
SA10n1065:543: taireva tasya kāśyapasya tathāgatasyāntikādupālambhābhiprāyaireṣā dharmadeśanā śrutā |
SA10n1065:545: evaṃtairvāg bhāṣitā - āścaryaṃ yāvat madhurapriyamāṇī kāśyapastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti |
SA10n1065:546: ta etenaikacittaprasādena pratilabdhena kālagatāḥ trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ |
SA10n1065:548: tenaiva ca hetunā iha mama śāsane pravrajitāḥ |
SA10n1065:549: tānyetāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni dṛṣṭipraskandhāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante kṛtaṃ punareṣāmanayā dharmadeśanayā parikarma |
SA10n1065:552: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - gaccha subhūte,
SA10n1065:554: subhūtirāha - bhagavata eva tāvadete bhāṣitaṃ vilomayanti,
SA10n1065:556: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣāvo gacchanti sma,
SA10n1065:557: tasmin mārge drau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma |
SA10n1065:558: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena mārgeṇa tau dvau bhikṣū nirmitakau tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma |
SA10n1065:562: tānyapi pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan - vayamapyāyuṣmantau bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe |
SA10n1065:564: nirmitakāvavocatām - tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ |
SA10n1065:568: kaścitpunaratra kāyaḥ ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo va,
SA10n1065:572: nirmitakāvavocatām - kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣayiṣyatha?
SA10n1065:573: te'vocan - na te adhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante,
